title: Dragon Air B-737 hit by typhoon in China ShenZhen
shortDescription: It was a combination of computer-generated graphics and genuine footage of an unrelated airliner incident.
longDescription: The first segment of the video was created by “MeniThings,” a production company which specializes in CGI and frequently posts content about UFOs and alien encounters. This video was originally shared to YouTube under the title “Extreme Crosswind | Airliner spins 360” and filed under the “entertainment” tag. More details at: https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/dragonair-737-typhoon/
